reviews.review:
While this does have a fresh rating on this site, many of the reviews from critics fall in the 2.5/ to 3/4 range. Personally, I have never really cared what critics think and I think the rift between what critics want and enjoy and the general population wants and enjoys grows bigger and bigger all the time. Personally, I think this was easily one of the best films in the MCU to date. 

Particularly surprising is the amount of depth and screen time Thanos actually gets. And its actually quite ingenious how he was written and couldn't have come at a more perfect time give the huge number of challenges we are facing on our own planet, 99% of which can be traced right back to overpopulation. That in itself gives Thanos and his mission to wipe out half of the population of the universe a resonance that most villains just don't achieve.

This film is definitely NOT for people who are just now coming into the MCU. This film was  written from the ground up for people that have been watching Marvels films all along. Anyone who goes to see this without seeing most, if not all of the previous 18 movies.....well, those will be the people that ultimately leave the theatre disappointed as not seeing the previous film will lower the impact of EVERYTHING in this film by like a factor of 100, especially the opening 10 minutes. This is a film masterfully crafted for MCU fans and it doesn't even begin to disappoint. 

Just a brilliant addition to the MCU, one that makes waiting for part 2 next May that much harder!!

ABSOLUTELY OUTSTANDING.... this movie captures everything I was expecting but with a million times more ... this comedy and character interaction is amazing... I don't think I've ever laughed so much in a cinema before... this movie ultimately won't get that high of a critic review mainly due to them seeing this as a stand-alone film and not understanding this has a part 2 .... this movie also does things which isn't usual for a blockbuster movie but they pulled of of amazingly.... in my eyes and in the eyes of my closest friends who have seen this we have all said it's the perfect movie we've ever seen .... congratulations marvel ... see you soon (hurry up!!!! Please)
Yes there is a lot going on but everything runs together smoothly. Every twist and turn will both entertain and surprise you! Amazing!

A massive effort to intertwine several threads into one whole plot for that last line to appear on the screen, truly fun and amazing. A villain that had some depth, who thought his actions were both somehow monstrous and  heroic. The first few minutes will set  your expectations on what Thanos was doing. Can't wait for the continuation.
The ending was awful and made regret going to the theater. It was like the opposite of what a superhero movie should be.
Non stop action. Never get a chance to recover in a good way!

Avengers:  Infinity War lived up to the hype.  The Russo brothers managed to tie in all those characters while telling a great story, making you laugh, sit on the edge of your seat and then cry during it all.  This franchise is truly one of a kind.
Funny as well as emotional albeit not statisfying, Avengers: Infinity War gives Marvel fans the villain they deserve, a villain that is right and a villain they will look forward to seeing again.
